mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (name, content, categoryId, userId, fileId, createdAt) VALUES (#{name}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{fileId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select:
SELECT seq, name, content, categoryId, userId, fileId, createdAt, updatedAt FROM post
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET name = #{name}, content = #{content}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, fileId = #{fileId}, updatedAt = #{updatedAt} WHERE seq = #{seq}
